com.bigdata.journal

Class DumpJournal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.journal.DumpJournal

  • public class DumpJournal
extends Object
    A utility class that opens the journal in a read-only mode and dumps the root blocks and metadata about the indices on a journal file. TODO add an option to dump only as of a specified commitTime? TODO GIST : Support all types of indices.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    GIST

    • Constructor Detail

      • DumpJournal

        public DumpJournal(Journal journal)

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Dump one or more journal files: 
         usage: (option*) filename+
        where option is any of:
        -namespace
        Dump only those indices having the specified namespace prefix.
        -history
        Dump metadata for indices in all commit records (default only dumps the metadata for the indices as of the most current committed state).
        -indices
        Dump the indices (does not show the tuples by default).
        -pages
        Dump the pages of the indices and reports some information on the page size.
        -tuples
        Dump the records in the indices.
        where filename is one or more journal file names.

      • dumpJournal

        public void dumpJournal(boolean dumpHistory,
               boolean dumpPages,
               boolean dumpIndices,
               boolean showTuples)
        Parameters:
        dumpHistory - Dump metadata for indices in all commit records (default only dumps the metadata for the indices as of the most current committed state).
        dumpPages - Dump the pages of the indices and reports some information on the page size.
        dumpIndices - Dump the indices (does not show the tuples by default).
        showTuples - Dump the records in the indices.

      • dumpJournal

        public void dumpJournal(PrintWriter out,
               List<String> namespaces,
               boolean dumpHistory,
               boolean dumpPages,
               boolean dumpIndices,
               boolean showTuples)
        Parameters:
        out - Where to write the output.
        namespaces - When non-empty and non-null, dump only those indices having any of the specified namespaces.
        dumpHistory - Dump metadata for indices in all commit records (default only dumps the metadata for the indices as of the most current committed state).
        dumpPages - Dump the pages of the indices and reports some information on the page size.
        dumpIndices - Dump the indices (does not show the tuples by default).
        showTuples - Dump the records in the indices.
